text: Dominic Nucciarone (23 January 1932 â€“ 12 August 2021) was an Italian-American professional wrestler and trainer. He was known under his ring name of Dominic DeNucci. He was born in Venice, Italy and was raised in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. His career began in 1958 and he retired in 2012. In June 2020, DeNucci was hospitalized for heart failure in McCandless, Pennsylvania. He died at the age of 89 on 12 August 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== *Dominic DeNucci at Online World of Wrestling *Titans of Wrestling * Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Italian professional wrestlers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Sportspeople from Venice Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Dominic DeNucci
